entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
